p: In addition, significant increase in the low‐frequency (LF, P < 0.01) and a decrease in high‐frequency (HF, P < 0.01) band was observed in Group C, compared to Groups N, B1 and B2. The LF/HF ratio was significantly increased in Group C (P < 0.01) relative to all other groups. When Group B2 was compared to B1, only SDNN showed significantly lower values (P < 0.05).
